content: --अभावः absolute or complete non-existence, absolute non-entity, a thing which does not exist at any one of the three periods of time, or does not exist for all time; त्रैकालिकसंसर्गावच्छिन्नप्रतियोगिकः. (This is considered to be नित्य or eternal and different from the other kinds of अभाव).
